website_summaries.verdict: Grilling rack to use with outdoor grill, accommodates up to 30 oysters.
pros: Convenient since it's used with outdoor grill to cook oysters and other shellfish
Constructed of stainless steel, so lighter than many heavy cast iron grill pans
Backed by popular grilling chef Steven Raichlen
Keeps shellfish flat during grilling to retain juices
Can also be used to grill other hors d'oeuvres such as stuffed mushrooms or stuffed artichokes
cons: Some purchasers complained that the holders are not large enough for certain types of oysters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rack for smoked oysters!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these racks! They hold oysters without spilling the liquor. We have 4 of these racks, and we prep the oysters with butter, garlic, bacon and Parmesan right on the racks and sit them on ice until we're ready to grill. They fit right onto our charcoal grill and then we sit them on a towel, ready to eat! You can see in the photo we have a dozen on the rack, but they are really big oysters.
customer_reviews.author: bkp

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my (Loftin Oysters Ceramic Reusable Chargrilling Oyster Shell) ceramic shells. It can hold 12 of those. I bought 24 of the dishes so after using this rack with 12 of them, I'm back to buy another one of these racks (as 2 will fit on my grill). So far this rack has worked perfectly and has made grilling shucked oysters much easier (compared to taking each oyster off of the grill one at a time). Now I'll be able to easily cook 24 oysters at a time.
customer_reviews.author: S.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... last Thanksgiving and let me tell you it was awesome. Before this I just layed all my oysters ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it this last Thanksgiving and let me tell you it was awesome. Before this I just layed all my oysters on the bottom of a tin foil turkey pan, it worked good until you took them out and all the juices came out of the oysters. With the rack it eliminates the rocking back and fourth of the oysters when you take them out of the oven. Highly recommended if you like to bake oysters in oven.
customer_reviews.author: J Vanger

customer_reviews.title: Great aid for grilling shellfish
customer_reviews.text: Grilled littleneck clams are a tasty delight, but managing the clams on your grill's regular grate is a real hassle, and you wind up spilling much of the clam juice into the fire. This rack makes it easy to manage about two dozen clams at once, and get nearly all the juice into your bowl along with the clams. Use long tongs and grab the lower shell-half after the clam opens up. (The meat will be in the top, making the cooked clam unstable without a rack like this.) Works just as well with oysters, but I have not tried mussels yet. Seems to be constructed very solidly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Siktberg

customer_reviews.title: Works great on most oysters
customer_reviews.text: Works great on most oysters under 2 1/2 inches. However, we have some that are 3 1/2" plus and deep cups. These will not stay upright when moving on/off grill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use it for seafood
customer_reviews.text: It's working well for a purpose that was not intended. I'm using this to store eggshells "planters" that I grew young succulent plants in. It's very convenient to move the whole tray when weather changes. The half eggshells fits better (doesn't jiggle as much when moving the tray) compared to the whole eggshells. All in all, I hope this will last a long time in ourdoor condition.
customer_reviews.author: consumer 101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool - makes it easier to grilled oysters with toppings without as much risk of spilling them. Easy to clean and store. You need this,
customer_reviews.author: EKT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilled or broiled oysters
customer_reviews.text: Makes doing grilled oysters so much easier. The oysters stay put and the lovely broth doesn’t tip out!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baked oysters!
customer_reviews.text: I make baked oysters every year at the holidays and it is always a juggle to get them in and out of the oven. This rack was PERFECT! I was able to fit 18 oysters on for baking. I'm looking forward to using it for more seafood challenges this summer on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for grilling shellfish!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for grilling clams and oysters. We have had other products for that use but they have always seem to work on the grill. This does not work, is easy to clean, and holds the shellfish without losing the juice. We have just ordered 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: eileen coleman

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my gas grill. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my gas grill. I use it to elevate my chicken and rib dishes slightly off the grill surface to allow more air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Power

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for the oysters Rockefeller that we serve
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for my restaurant. I've used them hundreds of times. They are perfect for the oysters Rockefeller that we serve.
customer_reviews.author: buffy

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine. My oysters were bigger than the hole
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine. My oysters were bigger than the hole, but it still worked and got plenty on the rack. I will use this all summer. Makes the best oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ati

customer_reviews.title: the best rack on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have used several roasting racks in the past, none was to my satisfaction. When I saw this one, and who designed it, I had no doubt that it would be the best. It holds oysters, and clams perfectly as not to loose the juices.(hooray) Anyone who loves roasted shellfish should have one! In addition, turned upside down, it can be used as a cooling rack for sheet pans.( I did )
customer_reviews.author: redellthompson

customer_reviews.title: It's just "ok"
customer_reviews.text: The rack works great, although the openings are to large for smaller clams. Littlenecks fell right through it?
customer_reviews.author: leroykidd

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for BBQ Oysters
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this but the openings are bit small for oysters, at least the larger oysters I picked up to BBQ. Made it work, though. Next time I will try it with smaller oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall G. Ward III

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling oysters somewhat easier
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this rack is great; just wish the openings were larger or shaped differently to make placing the shells on it easier and more stable. But overall I'm still pleased and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mu1yvi

customer_reviews.title: Made grilling very easy
customer_reviews.text: We loved how easy everything stayed of the holder. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling clams!
customer_reviews.text: My dad and I just discovered this year the joys of grilling cherrystone clams on the grill. We always got sad every time they tipped over and all the precious clam juices fell into the grill. With this rack, the clams stay in place and we get yummy goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery,great merchandise
customer_reviews.text: used to charbroil oysters on bar b q pit.....worked well ,pretty easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son who loves to cook/barbecue. He loves to cook clams casino, etc. and this was the perfect gift for him. He was very pleased, and has used it several times already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grilled oysters
customer_reviews.text: Great grilling rack. Made New Orleans style grilled oysters. They turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull for Clams and Oysters
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful addition for my Weber grill. Clams take 7min. Oysters a little longer. My only complaint is that for both Cherrystone Clams and larger Eastern Oysters you can only use about half the holes, just about 1 doz. not a lot for a party, but the results are wonderful, If you are carefully all the juice stays in the shells. Give them 5-10 mins to cool down a little, gloves or towels are too messy! Dou.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would like a smaller one for my smaller portable
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for grilling oysters, would like a smaller one for my smaller portable grill
customer_reviews.author: Dr Hansken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job roasting oysters or coking oysters Rockefeller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert n.

customer_reviews.title: Seafood Rack
customer_reviews.text: This seafood rack makes it much easier to prepare your clams and oysters. While advertised for the grill, I see no reason why it can't be used in an oven.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley M. Iwaszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: oysters don't fit there
customer_reviews.text: what kind of seefood? oysters don't fit there, too small Steven Raichlen Best of Barbecue Stainless Steel Seafood Grilling Rack
customer_reviews.author: Goldfishka

customer_reviews.title: Seafood on the Grill
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed, easy to use. I can vouch for this product -- it holds stuffed oysters over the grill beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Summers

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the oven on a cookie sheet or directly ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for oysters. Works great in the oven on a cookie sheet or directly on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds shelfish level
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to cook shellfish on a regular grill. This will hold them level so the juices don't leak out. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice to BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Yes I like the this rack bbq a bunch of oysters came out great every love them!! will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: tito

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, as advertised. A little tricky lining up the oysters side by side while trying not to nudge the one next to it outta place.
customer_reviews.author: John McEntee

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Its the best thing I've found for cooking oysters on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Lester R. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill rack
customer_reviews.text: We haven't use this grill rack yet, but based on the size and appearance, it should work very well for grilling oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ accessary
customer_reviews.text: This grilling rack is perfect for grilling and smoking oysters or clams. You don't have to worry about losing the juices (liquor) while they're grilling.
customer_reviews.author: OlDave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for grilling shellfish. I use it for oysters and countneck clams. It keep them from tipping and spilling out the tasty brine that they cook in. If you grill shellfish then this is a tool that is needed!
customer_reviews.author: Beantownbuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. Great for any shelled seafood on the grill. We have a Kamado Joe and it works well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Merideth Henry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, good for 1-1/2" clams, oysters are to big, should have another oblong model in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Grill Rack
customer_reviews.text: This works a lot better than just putting shellfish on the grill. However, for oysters, like gulf or blue point, the gap is to small. Might get my channel lock pliers out for alterations.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Great for baked oysters
customer_reviews.text: Great for baked oysters! So much easier to use than a cast-iron oyster pan.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well on Medium to large size. The small ones fall thru.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Casablanca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but too small. No room for large oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Berry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loved the gift!!!! was very good service from the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who grills oisters all the time and he loves it. I haven't been home to see him use it yet, but I can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. It's exactly what I am looking for. It's is helping me very much when I am cooking in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Santos Melo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for oyster cooking on bbq and in oven
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kay

customer_reviews.title: seafood griller
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm, also can be used to grill fish etc on. Very happy with it! Highly reccomended
customer_reviews.author: Tina van Kooten

product_meta.title: Steven Raichlen SR8071 Seafood Rack, 13.98-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: There is nothing like the high, dry heat of the grill to bring out the briny succulence of oysters, clams & mussels. The Stainless Steel shellfish rack from Steven Raichlen best of barbecue is designed to hold shellfish flat during grilling to you keep the succulent juices where they belong - in the shellfish, not on the coals. The seafood rack can also be used to grill unforgettable hors d'oeuvres, like stuffed Mushrooms or artichoke hearts.
feature_bullets: Handles to lift on and off grill
Holds shellfish flat retaining juices in shell
Grill stuffed mushrooms or baby artichokes
